title: Cost-Sensitive Learning
example: Explain how cost-sensitive learning can be used to penalize misclassification of the minority class more heavily.
Example: "An_P_2021" addresses class imbalance issues in sleep stage classification using hybrid-channel EEG signals.

all_upper_levels.title: Addressing Data Scarcity and Class Imbalance
all_upper_levels.section_id: 7 Addressing Data Scarcity and Class Imbalance
